title: Happy Birthday, Ayumu-san!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Ayumu-san, happy birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Thank you, Setsuna-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>We prepared a play to celebrate your bright future. Would you like to watch it now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Huh? A play......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yep. Shizuku-san and Hanamaru-san are going to be in it, and I wrote the script for it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufu, sounds like it’ll be fun to watch. What kind of play is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ayumu’s childhood friend is kidnapped by an evil organization, so Ayumu asks the School Idol Squadron for help. But Ayumu-san is extremely worried and can’t wait any longer..... So she trains herself and becomes a member of the School Idol Squadron to rescue her childhood friend herself!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Wow! What an awesome story......!! That’s perfect for me......!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Come on, let’s go, Ayumu-san...... The School Idol Squadron is waiting for you!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
